14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar: "The Prophet (ﷺ) prohibited studding the stallion." [He said:] There are narrations on this topic from Abu Hurairah, Anas, and Abu Sa'eed. [Abu 'Eisa said:] The Hadith is Ibn 'Umar is a Hasan Sahih Hadith. This is acted upon according to some of the people of knowledge. There are those who made concession for accepting an honorarium for that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ عَسْبِ الْفَحْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Sell The Sperm Of A Stallion
